The LCLC offers multiple professional development opportunities for LCSL faculty and graduate students.           Professional Development  The LCLC offers multiple professional development opportunities for LCSL faculty and graduate students.             Instructor Resources  The LCLC has many resources for LCSL faculty, staff, and graduate students from training and documentation to equipment             COVID-19 Resources  The LCLC compiled a list of resources for instructors and students to ease into online classes.              For Instructors           Professional Development     LCSL 505: Teaching Professional Development Workshop    Chicago Language Symposium     2019 Chicago Language Symposium      Pre-semester LCSL Orientation    Certificate Program      Instructor Resources     Blackboard Help    Google Apps, Video Editing, and More!    Instructor Workshops & Drop In Hours    LCLC Newsletter    Equipment For Instructors    Language Oasis (GH 308)     Reserving GH 308        COVID-19 Resources             Blackboard Help  Need help with Blackboard? Click here to explore different resources and help documents about Blackboard. If you can't find what you are looking for, feel free to contact us and schedule a workshop!      Google Apps and More!  Learn all about Google Apps at UIC and other useful technology tools like video editing, creating quizzes, forms, or websites. See here for more information.      LCLC Weekly Newsletter  If you would like to signup to receive our weekly newsletter or see the previous editions click here.      Contact Us  Do you want to schedule an event in the Language Oasis? Do you need help with a technology tool or want to schedule a workshop? Contact us with any questions you may have!
